entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 3.
